verses.verse: And <WG1161> it came to pass <WG1096> in <WG1722> Iconium, <WG2430> that they <WG846> went <WG1525> both together <WG2596> <WG846> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> synagogue <WG4864> of the <WG3588> Jews, <WG2453> and <WG2532> so <WG3779> spake, <WG2980> that <WG5620> a great <WG4183> multitude <WG4128> both <WG5037> of the Jews <WG2453> and <WG2532> also of the Greeks <WG1672> believed. <WG4100>

But <WG1161> the <WG3588> unbelieving <WG544> Jews <WG2453> stirred up <WG1892> the <WG3588> Gentiles, <WG1484> and <WG2532> made their minds evil affected <WG2559> <WG5590> against <WG2596> the <WG3588> brethren. <WG80>

Long <WG2425> time <WG5550> <WG3303> therefore <WG3767> abode <WG1304> they speaking boldly <WG3955> in <WG1909> the <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> which <WG3588> gave testimony <WG3140> unto the <WG3588> word <WG3056> of his <WG848> grace, <WG5485> and <WG2532> granted <WG1325> signs <WG4592> and <WG2532> wonders <WG5059> to be done <WG1096> by <WG1223> their <WG846> hands. <WG5495>

But <WG1161> the <WG3588> multitude <WG4128> of the <WG3588> city <WG4172> was divided: <WG4977> and <WG2532> part <WG3588> <WG3303> held <WG2258> with <WG4862> the <WG3588> Jews, <WG2453> and <WG1161> part <WG3588> with <WG4862> the <WG3588> apostles. <WG652>

And <WG1161> when <WG5613> there was <WG1096> an assault <WG3730> made both <WG5037> of the <WG3588> Gentiles, <WG1484> and <WG2532> also of the Jews <WG2453> with <WG4862> their <WG846> rulers, <WG758> to use them despitefully, <WG5195> and <WG2532> to stone <WG3036> them, <WG846>

They were aware of <WG4894> it, and fled <WG2703> unto <WG1519> Lystra <WG3082> and <WG2532> Derbe, <WG1191> cities <WG4172> of Lycaonia, <WG3071> and <WG2532> into the <WG3588> region that lieth round about: <WG4066>
And there <WG2546> they preached the gospel. <WG2258> <WG2097>

And <WG2532> there sat <WG2521> a certain <WG5100> man <WG435> at <WG1722> Lystra, <WG3082> impotent <WG102> in his feet, <WG4228> being <WG5225> a cripple <WG5560> from <WG1537> his <WG848> mother's <WG3384> womb, <WG2836> who <WG3739> never <WG3763> had walked: <WG4043>

The same <WG3778> heard <WG191> Paul <WG3972> speak: <WG2980> who <WG3739> steadfastly beholding <WG816> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> perceiving <WG1492> that <WG3754> he had <WG2192> faith <WG4102> to be healed, <WG4982>
Said <WG2036> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> Stand <WG450> upright <WG3717> on <WG1909> thy <WG4675> feet. <WG4228> And he leaped <WG242> and <WG2532> walked. <WG4043>

And <WG1161> when the <WG3588> people <WG3793> saw <WG1492> what <WG3739> Paul <WG3972> had done, <WG4160> they lifted up <WG1869> their <WG848> voices, <WG5456> saying <WG3004> in the speech of Lycaonia, <WG3072> The <WG3588> gods <WG2316> are come down <WG2597> to <WG4314> us <WG2248> in the likeness <WG3666> of men. <WG444>

And <WG5037> they called <WG2564> Barnabas, <WG921> <WG3303> Jupiter; <WG2203> and <WG1161> Paul, <WG3972> Mercurius, <WG2060> because <WG1894> he <WG846> was <WG2258> the <WG3588> chief speaker. <WG2233> <WG3056>

Then <WG1161> the <WG3588> priest <WG2409> of Jupiter, <WG2203> which was <WG5607> before <WG4253> their <WG846> city, <WG4172> brought <WG5342> oxen <WG5022> and <WG2532> garlands <WG4725> unto <WG1909> the <WG3588> gates, <WG4440> and would <WG2309> have done sacrifice <WG2380> with <WG4862> the <WG3588> people. <WG3793>

Which when <WG1161> the <WG3588> apostles, <WG652> Barnabas <WG921> and <WG2532> Paul, <WG3972> heard <WG191> of, they rent <WG1284> their <WG848> clothes, <WG2440> and ran in <WG1530> among <WG1519> the <WG3588> people, <WG3793> crying out, <WG2896>

And <WG2532> saying, <WG3004> Sirs, <WG435> why <WG5101> do <WG4160> ye these things? <WG5023> We <WG2249> also <WG2532> are <WG2070> men <WG444> of like passions <WG3663> with you, <WG5213> and preach <WG2097> unto you <WG5209> that ye should turn <WG1994> from <WG575> these <WG5130> vanities <WG3152> unto <WG1909> the <WG3588> living <WG2198> God, <WG2316> which <WG3739> made <WG4160> heaven, <WG3772> and <WG2532> earth, <WG1093> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> sea, <WG2281> and <WG2532> all things <WG3956> that <WG3588> are therein: <WG1722> <WG846>
Who <WG3739> in <WG1722> times <WG1074> past <WG3944> suffered <WG1439> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484> to walk <WG4198> in their own <WG848> ways. <WG3598>

Nevertheless <WG2544> he left <WG863> not <WG3756> himself <WG1438> without witness, <WG267> in that he did good, <WG15> and gave <WG1325> us <WG2254> rain <WG5205> from heaven, <WG3771> and <WG2532> fruitful <WG2593> seasons, <WG2540> filling <WG1705> our <WG2257> hearts <WG2588> with food <WG5160> and <WG2532> gladness. <WG2167>
And <WG2532> with these <WG5023> sayings <WG3004> scarce <WG3433> restrained <WG2664> they the <WG3588> people, <WG3793> that they had not <WG3361> done sacrifice <WG2380> unto them. <WG846>

And <WG1161> there came thither <WG1904> certain Jews <WG2453> from <WG575> Antioch <WG490> and <WG2532> Iconium, <WG2430> who <WG2532> persuaded <WG3982> the <WG3588> people, <WG3793> and, <WG2532> having stoned <WG3034> Paul, <WG3972> drew <WG4951> him out <WG1854> of the <WG3588> city, <WG4172> supposing <WG3543> he <WG846> had been dead. <WG2348>

Howbeit, <WG1161> as the <WG3588> disciples <WG3101> stood round about <WG2944> him, <WG846> he rose up, <WG450> and came <WG1525> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> city: <WG4172> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> next day <WG1887> he departed <WG1831> with <WG4862> Barnabas <WG921> to <WG1519> Derbe. <WG1191>

And <WG5037> when they had preached the gospel <WG2097> to that <WG1565> city, <WG4172> and <WG2532> had taught <WG3100> many, <WG2425> they returned again <WG5290> to <WG1519> Lystra, <WG3082> and <WG2532> to Iconium, <WG2430> and <WG2532> Antioch, <WG490>

Confirming <WG1991> the <WG3588> souls <WG5590> of the <WG3588> disciples, <WG3101> and exhorting <WG3870> them to continue <WG1696> in the <WG3588> faith, <WG4102> and <WG2532> that <WG3754> we <WG2248> must <WG1163> through <WG1223> much <WG4183> tribulation <WG2347> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>

And <WG1161> when they had ordained <WG5500> them <WG846> elders <WG4245> in every church, <WG2596> <WG1577> and had prayed <WG4336> with <WG3326> fasting, <WG3521> they commended <WG3908> them <WG846> to the <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> on <WG1519> whom <WG3739> they believed. <WG4100>
And <WG2532> after they had passed throughout <WG1330> Pisidia, <WG4099> they came <WG2064> to <WG1519> Pamphylia. <WG3828>
And <WG2532> when they had preached <WG2980> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> in <WG1722> Perga, <WG4011> they went down <WG2597> into <WG1519> Attalia: <WG825>

And thence <WG2547> sailed <WG636> to <WG1519> Antioch, <WG490> from whence <WG3606> they had been <WG2258> recommended <WG3860> to the <WG3588> grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> for <WG1519> the <WG3588> work <WG2041> which <WG3739> they fulfilled. <WG4137>

And <WG1161> when they were come, <WG3854> and <WG2532> had gathered the church together, <WG4863> <WG3588> <WG1577> they rehearsed <WG312> all that <WG3745> God <WG2316> had done <WG4160> with <WG3326> them, <WG846> and <WG2532> how <WG3754> he had opened <WG455> the door <WG2374> of faith <WG4102> unto the <WG3588> Gentiles. <WG1484>
